    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Gremo v hribe</string>
            <string language="en">Visiting the mountains</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Besuchen der Berge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Visiter les montagnes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Visitando as montanhas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Visita delle montagne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επίσκεψη των βουνών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Visitar las montañas</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Gremo v hribe je kviz o tem, kako se pripravimo na izlet v hribe, kaj vzamemo s seboj, kako se oblečemo ... Učenci izmed danih možnosti izberejo tisti odgovor, ki se jim zdi najbolj pravilen. Pri nekaterih vprašanjih sta možna dva pravilna odgovora.</string>
            <string language="en">Collection of quiz type questions about the mountains and needed equipment.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">pohodništvo</string>
            <string language="en">walking</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">gorništvo</string>
            <string language="en">mountaineering</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">nahrbtnik</string>
            <string language="en">knapsack</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">gora</string>
            <string language="en">mountain</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ansammlung Quiztyp Fragen über die Berge und die
erforderliche Ausrüstung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Collection de type questions de jeu au sujet des 
montagnes et du matériel nécessaire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Coleção do tipo perguntas do quiz sobre as 
montanhas e o equipamento needed.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Accumulazione del tipo domande di quiz circa le 
montagne e le attrezzature necessarie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συλλογή των ερωτήσεων τύπων διαγωνισμοου γνώσεων για 
τα βουνά και τον αναγκαίο εξοπλισμό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Colección de tipo preguntas del concurso sobre 
las montañas y el equipo necesario.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gehen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bergsteigen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rucksack</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
